entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:08 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
